item.description:

this is my code

} if(UsedOnObjectID == 75 && ItemID == 230){ deleteItem(230, 1); addItem(Item.randomBox(), 1); sM("You Take Your Reward From The Reward Chest!"); } else { sM("You need a key and open inv spot!"); }

Any help?
